models.name: gpt-4o-mini
models.optimal_use_case: Most affordable GPT-4 class model, excellent for lightweight tasks and high volume.

models.name: gpt-3.5-turbo
models.optimal_use_case: Cost-effective for general tasks, good for high-throughput applications.

models.name: gpt-4o
models.optimal_use_case: Fastest GPT-4 model with multimodal capabilities, ideal for complex SQL generation.

models.name: gpt-4-turbo
models.optimal_use_case: Most capable model for complex reasoning and large context windows (128k tokens).

models.name: command-r
models.optimal_use_case: Optimized for RAG, cost-effective for high-volume database queries.

models.name: command-r-plus
models.optimal_use_case: Most powerful Cohere model for complex reasoning and advanced SQL optimization.

models.name: j2-light
models.optimal_use_case: Lightweight and cost-effective, suitable for straightforward SQL queries.

models.name: j2-mid
models.optimal_use_case: Balanced performance for general text generation and moderate complexity tasks.

models.name: j2-ultra
models.optimal_use_case: Most powerful AI21 model for complex reasoning and advanced SQL generation.

models.name: gemini-1.5-flash-latest
models.optimal_use_case: Google AI Studio's permanent free tier. Excellent for fast, high-quality code and logic tasks. Rate-limited.

models.name: gemini-1.5-pro-latest
models.optimal_use_case: Google AI Studio's free tier. Top-tier reasoning for complex regex/SQL logic. Rate-limited.

models.name: claude-3-haiku-20240307
models.optimal_use_case: Uses the initial free credits ($5+) for new API accounts. Extremely fast and capable for code/logic. Trial-based.

models.name: codestral-latest
models.optimal_use_case: Mistral's 'La Plateforme' free developer tier. Specialized for code generation. Rate-limited.

models.name: mistral-small-latest
models.optimal_use_case: Mistral's 'La Plateforme' free developer tier. Great balance of speed and performance. Rate-limited.

models.name: llama-3.1-70b-versatile
models.optimal_use_case: Groq's free developer tier. Extremely fast (LPU-based). High-performance open-source model. Rate-limited.

models.name: llama-3.1-8b-instant
models.optimal_use_case: Groq's free developer tier. Blazing fast for simpler tasks and instant responses. Rate-limited.

models.name: meta-llama/Llama-3.1-70B-Instruct-Turbo
models.optimal_use_case: Uses the initial free credits (e.g., $25) for new accounts. Good for testing a wide variety of open-source models. Trial-based.

models.name: openrouter/polaris-alpha
models.optimal_use_case: OpenRouter's permanent free tier. A strong, general-purpose model. Limited to ~50 requests/day.

models.name: meta-llama/llama-4-scout:free
models.optimal_use_case: OpenRouter's permanent free tier. A top-tier open model, great for code. Limited to ~50 requests/day.

models.name: anthropic.claude-3-haiku-v1
models.optimal_use_case: Part of the 12-month AWS Free Tier for new AWS accounts. Subject to specific usage quotas.
